name: Tri-Media Integrated Marketing Technologies
overview:
Tri-Media Integrated Marketing Technologies, Inc. provides integrated marketing communications to government agencies, businesses, and SMEs in North America and Europe. It offers strategic consulting, creative, interactive, and agency network services; and online content management systems, digital marketing applications, e-commerce and online reservation tools, online communications, alert systems, business intelligence tools, and search engine optimization solutions.

The companyâ€™s solutions include tmSuite, a Web-based marketing software for marketing agencies and clients; tmConference that offers a Web or audio conference service to assist in communications/presentations; tmCentral, a Web-based agency management solution; and tmReservations, an online reservations engine. It also provides Web hosting, database hosting, multimedia, and email services, as well as domain names. In addition, the company offers intelligent mass notification solutions and social commerce network platforms. It serves manufacturing, retail, government, gaming, hospitality/tourism, restaurant/food business, and sports/fitness industries.

The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Welland, Canada with additional offices in Niagara and Toronto, Canada; Chicago, Illinois; Nanjing, China; and Minsk, Belarus.

acquisitions.source_description: Tri-Media Integrated Marketing Technologies Acquires U.S.-based Mass Notification Company
